localization.nonparameteric¶

Module for nonparameteric implementations of Bayesian Filters. Specifically, a particle filter base and histogram filter are contained in this module.

Classes

Particle([state, weight, Map])

A basic particle object for use in a particle filter.

ParticleFilter([n_particles, ...])

This is a base class particle filter that contains many of the re-usable elements common across implementaitons of particle fitlers.
